name: GYANENDRA DWIVEDI
bio: Gyanendra (Gyan) Dwivedi is a systems thinker and automation specialist who designs lead management and customer communication workflows using tools like N8N, WhatsApp APIs, CRMs, and web integrations. His work focuses on helping creators and businesses streamline their processesâ€”turning online engagement into structured, trackable, and scalable outcomes. With a strong grasp of both technology and user behavior, Gyan bridges the gap between traffic and conversion with precision-driven systems.
